E-mail address?: jitzlow@gmail.com
What position do you want?: In-game moderator or admin or web developer not server developer as i cant code very well.
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: Im am a very new coder not a strong position for me.
What time zone are you in?: GST
How long will you be on everyday? (3 hours+): 4 hours.
Why do you want to become part of this server?: I prefer 667 gfx. and it sounds like the owner has some clue of what he’s doing.
Any Suggestions?: Recruit a small number of staff at first.
Proof of experience?: skype me. brayden.bailey
